@sijodk AFAIK Win Xp does not support language packs. Try other torrent of quake that will work just fine on your XP machine.
This is version 3.06 and I need 3.21.

Start>Settings>Control Panel>Regional and Language Options>Advanced 

set it to "English - United Kingdom", yes. Reboot. 

And then you can install.
